normal.name: Soul Reap
normal.description: Deals 120% ATK as Fire damage to a single target.

auto.name: Falling Flame
auto.description: Deals 3 hits of 120% ATK as Fire damage and applies 1 stack of [Divine Flame].

ultimate.name: Judgment Strike
ultimate.description:
After casting, you may chain three segments within 4 s:
1. Dash to target, deal 480% ATK Fire damage + apply [Divine Flame].
2. Leap backward, deal 480% ATK Fire damage + apply [Divine Flame].
3. Jump & charge, deal 480% ATK Fire damage; each DoT stack on the target adds another 48% ATK Fire damage (max 20 extra hits).

passive.name: Raven's Insight
passive.description:
All Odin's damage counts as DoT and cannot crit.
Pre-battle: every 1% crit rate -> +1% Fire dmg; every 2% crit dmg -> +1% ATK.
Skills / ultimates apply [Divine Flame]: every 3 s deals 36% ATK Fire damage, stacks up to 10, lasts 10 s.

teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
teamSkill.description:
If the party has 2 A.S.A or 2 Fire characters:
ATK +10%.
At battle start, every 500 ATK grants +3% Penetration (max 6 times).

awakenings.effect: Targets without [Divine Flame] instantly receive 5 stacks; +20 % DoT for 5 s after ultimate; 50 % damage reduction during ultimate.
Ultimate third-segment extra hits cap raised to 30; enemies with [Divine Flame] take +20 % DoT from Odin.
Normal / Skill / Ultimate / Passive level cap +2.
Normal / Skill / Ultimate / Passive level cap +2.
Every 3 ultimates, next normal attack becomes a skill; Odin's DoT ignores 20 % Fire resistance.

memoryCard.name: Shared Bath Time
effects: ATK +40 %; ultimate damage +40 % for the caster.
After each ultimate, gain 1 [Charge]. When dealing damage, consume [Charge] to apply 1 stack of [Final Flame]: deals 15 % ATK Fire damage every 2 s, stacks up to 5, lasts 10 s.
